sql:
SELECT xichengqubeijingshiwenwubaohudanwei31.名称, xichengqubeijingshiwenwubaohudanwei31.地址, xichengquxichengquxingjifandianminglu19.?星级酒店名称, xichengquxichengquxingjifandianminglu19.?联系电话, xichengquxichengquxingjifandianminglu19.?酒店地址 
FROM xichengqubeijingshiwenwubaohudanwei31 
JOIN xichengquxichengquxingjifandianminglu19 ON xichengqubeijingshiwenwubaohudanwei31.序号 = xichengquxichengquxingjifandianminglu19.序号
